about: I'm an aspiring developer with a passion for tackling new challenges and continually learning. I'm motivated by personal growth and the opportunity to contribute meaningfully to the projects I'm part of.

Currently, I'm pursuing my master's degree in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Networks at CNAM (National Conservatory of Arts and Professions) in Paris, France. I've delved into topics like AI, Operations Research, and Computer Architecture, and I'm excited to expand my knowledge in the coming semesters.

Alongside my studies, I've gained hands-on experience in both customer service, marketing, and business. At Fidelity Investments, I worked closely with a mentor from the tech department on Java-based projects. During my time at AIESEC in France, I built a program that connected to our organization's GraphQL API to automate data management tasks like updating spreadsheets. As a high school student, I created my own lawn mowing business, reaching 30 regular clients in just 5 years.
In my down time, I love to explore Paris, make music, snowboard, travel, and work on coding projects.

portfolio.title: Crypto Trader
portfolio.description: Building an automated system in Golang to place trades for cryptocurrencies that implements custom trading strategies defined by users. Programmed a client for the Kraken Crypto exchange Rest and Websocket APIs. Implementing concurrency, channels, mutexes & linked lists. Using InfluxDB for time series data storage.

portfolio.title: Flashcards
portfolio.description: Developed a flashcard Web App using React for front end and Golang for back end. Users can edit or review flashcard decks as well as create new flashcard decks. Each flashcard deck contains individual flashcards with a description and an answer. Flashcard decks and each flashcard are saved in memory. This project takes advantage of the React Router for the different edit/review functionalities and state for a  form to input data to create new flashcard decks.

portfolio.title: Quizzy
portfolio.description: Designed a program using C++ that lets a user create a quiz containing true/false, multiple choice, and longanswer questions. This project takes advantage of inheritance by using an Answer parent class that is extended by children classes with their respective answer types. The quiz is able to be saved locally as a text file.

portfolio.title: SkiView
portfolio.description: Created a Web App in React to provide current weather conditions at ski resorts using a resort's longitude and latitude coordinates. The list of ski resorts can be edited.

experience.title: High Net Worth Associate
description: Provided efficient communication strategies on product and service calls, averaging over 5 clients per hour.
Maintained high attention to detail with 0 errors on equity and mutual fund trades in client accounts.
Problem solved and troubleshooted errors on website using system applications in client accounts.

experience.title: Head of Marketing
description: Built the organization's 1st system to automatically update data trackers using Google Apps Scripts, Google Sheets, and the AIESEC GraphQL API.
Created an emailing system that sent email templates to leads using Google Sheets and Google Apps Scripts.
Conducted semi-annual PESTEL, SWOT, competitor analyses, and market research to gather insights and adjust organizational processes to better fit the needs of our customers and industry environment.
Delivered 21 sessions at 7 conferences and bi-weekly meetings with marketing team members.
Grew followers on LinkedIn and Instagram by 17% & 11% with no paid in-platform advertisements.

education.description: Taking courses on Artificial Intelligence, Operational Research, Computer Architecture & more.
Completed 2 majors in Finance and International Business, taking classes on Financial Valuation, International Market Entry, Bank Management, Cross Cultural Leadership & more.
